meanings.sent1: She dissimilates her outfits by mixing patterns and colors.
meanings.sent2: The artist dissimilates the painting by adding unique textures.
meanings.sent3: The chef playfully dissimilates the traditional recipe with a modern twist.
meanings.sent4: His innovative approach dissimilates the usual methods of problem-solving.
meanings.sent5: The new software feature truly dissimilates it from its competitors.

meanings.sent1: The chemical compounds dissimilate when exposed to heat.

meanings.sent4: As time passes, memories can dissimilate and become distorted.
